Description: Spacious one bedroom on the second floor of a professionally managed Brighton condo building, just steps away from the Brookline line and the C/D trains, available September 1st! This beautiful unit features a recently renovated kitchen with granite couters+stainless steel appliances, and a large open living space with enough room for both a dining area and home office. Additional features include hardwood floors, high ceilings and a large bedroom with plenty of closet/storage space. Laundry is available on the premises and small pets will be considered. Rent includes heat, hot water AND ONE OFF STREET PARKING SPACE!
